description: Airbus 3rd Observer Seat PN Inspection - Conditional Remove
justification: Potential safety issue if seat is used without an update to the hinge bolt
impact: Plan is to remove any seat that is affected by subject EA to have work done either at shop or by an A&P mechanic
instructions_json:
[{"instruction":"

Gain access to 3rd Observer Seat identification placard to read part and serial number. See below for location

 

","notes":""},{"instruction":"

Make note of part number and serial number of seat

Part Number   ___________________________________

Serial Number ___________________________________

","notes":""},{"instruction":"

If seat's MFG part number is 16800-00-00, 16800-01-00 or 16800-01-01 and MFG serial number is less than 17T0001 skip to Step 5.

","notes":""},{"instruction":"

Update DR as follows "No further action required. 3rd Observer Seat MFG part number is ______________ and serial number is ____________".

Restore simulator as necessary

Have DR routed to Engineering to close

Skip all remaining steps in this document

","notes":""},{"instruction":"

Only accomplish this step if the 3rd Observer Seat you inspected meets the part and serial number requirements stated in Step 3.

Create a new DR titled "3rd Obersever Seat removed per A320-20260217-102". Make DR Flight Crew Visible and MMI.

Order new seat M&E Number 18-2511-9-0003 against the new DR

","notes":""},{"instruction":"

A. Remove the 3rd observer Seat

(1) In the cockpit, open the life-vest compartment door of the third occupant seat (2).

(2) Remove the life vest if installed.

(3) Remove the retaining pins (1).

(4) Pull up on seat release lever to disengage lockpin from upper guide tube before removal.

(5) Hold the third occupant seat (2) and remove the guide tubes (4) and (10) from the upper and lower sleeves (3) and (5).

(6) Remove the third observer seat (2).

(7) Leave mounting brackets (3) and (5) installed at this time

 

Move seat to computer room, clearly marked with DR number, Sim reference and this SEA reference number.

","notes":""},{"instruction":"

Restore simulator as necessary for return to service

Route the original DR to Engineering to close

","notes":""}]
